revision.text: {{KeyPolicyQuestionTemplate |HasDescription=What are the impacts of increasing livestock production on land use, greenhouse gases and other emissions to air and surface water? |BelongsToComponent=Livestock systems |FoodThemeItem=Animal husbandry (Food); Nutrition and diet (Food) |AirThemeItem=Air quality (Air pollution); Other air pollution (Air pollution) |ClimateThemeItem=GHG emissions (Climate) }}

{{KeyPolicyQuestionTemplate |HasDescription=How do climate change and land-use management affect the land productivity of current and future agricultural land? |BelongsToComponent=Carbon, vegetation, agriculture and water |LanduseThemeItem=Agricultural land use (Land use) |FoodThemeItem=Crop production (Food) |ClimateThemeItem=Climate change (Climate) |BelongsToTheme=Multiple themes }}

revision.comment: Text replace - "Natural vegetation and carbon cycle" to "Carbon cycle and natural vegetation"

revision.text: {{KeyPolicyQuestionTemplate |HasDescription=How will agriculture affect the Earth system with respect to carbon emissions, freshwater availability and nutrient cycles? |BelongsToComponent=Crops and grass |WaterThemeItem=Water stress (Water) |LanduseThemeItem=Agricultural land use (Land use) |NatureThemeItem=Land cover (NB) }}

{{KeyPolicyQuestionTemplate |HasDescription=How do energy policies contribute to economic and social development, and how do they support or hamper a more sustainable future? |BelongsToComponent=Air pollution and energy policies |EnergyThemeItem=Energy demand (Energy) |AirThemeItem=Air quality (Air pollution) |ClimateThemeItem=Climate mitigation (Climate) }}

{{KeyPolicyQuestionTemplate |HasDescription=What are the synergies and trade-offs between halting biodiversity loss, food security, reducing nutrient emissions, and reducing water stress? |BelongsToComponent=Land and biodiversity policies |WaterThemeItem=Water stress (Water) |NatureThemeItem=Terrestrial biodiversity (NB) |FoodThemeItem=Other food (Food) }}

{{KeyPolicyQuestionTemplate |HasDescription=How could global environmental issues such as climate change, biodiversity loss and air pollution evolve? |BelongsToComponent=IMAGE framework summary |NatureThemeItem=Aquatic biodiversity (NB); Terrestrial biodiversity (NB) |AirThemeItem=Air quality (Air pollution) |ClimateThemeItem=Climate change (Climate) }}

{{KeyPolicyQuestionTemplate |HasDescription=What are the consequences of these changes for international targets for biodiversity protection (addressed by the CBD), climate change (UNFCCC) and human development (addressed by the Millennium Development Goals and Sustainable Development Goals)? |BelongsToComponent=IMAGE framework summary |NatureThemeItem=Aquatic biodiversity (NB); Terrestrial biodiversity (NB) |AirThemeItem=Air quality (Air pollution) |ClimateThemeItem=Climate change (Climate) }}

{{KeyPolicyQuestionTemplate |HasDescription=What are the policy options to reduce agricultural land use and to safeguard global biodiversity, while ensuring food security? |BelongsToComponent=Agricultural economy |LanduseThemeItem=Agricultural land use (Land use) |NatureThemeItem=Terrestrial biodiversity (NB) |FoodThemeItem=Food demand (Food) }}

revision.comment: Created page with "{{KeyPolicyQuestionTemplate |HasDescription=What is the effect of the NDCs on achieving the long term 2 ºC target? |BelongsToComponent=Climate policy; |ClimateThemeItem=Clima..."

revision.text:
This is the "KeyPolicyQuestionTemplate" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{KeyPolicyQuestionTemplate
|HasDescription=
|PQBelongsToComponent=
|BelongsToTheme=
|ThemeItem=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. {{#ifeq:{{{HasDescription|}}}|||}} {{#ifeq:{{{BelongsToComponent|}}}|||}} {{#ifeq:{{{HumanDevelopmentThemeItem|}}}{{{WaterThemeItem|}}}{{{EnergyThemeItem|}}}{{{LanduseThemeItem|}}}{{{NatureThemeItem|}}}{{{FoodThemeItem|}}}{{{AirThemeItem|}}}{{{ClimateThemeItem|}}}|||}}
'''Description:''' [[HasDescription::{{{HasDescription|}}}]]
'''Belongs to component:''' {{#arraymap:{{{BelongsToComponent|}}}|;|x|[[PQBelongsToComponent::x]]}}
'''Associated theme items:''' {{#arraymap:{{{HumanDevelopmentThemeItem|}}};{{{WaterThemeItem|}}};{{{EnergyThemeItem|}}};{{{LanduseThemeItem|}}};{{{NatureThemeItem|}}};{{{FoodThemeItem|}}};{{{AirThemeItem|}}};{{{ClimateThemeItem|}}}|;|x|[[HasThemeItem::x]]|, }}

[[Category:KeyPolicyQuestion]] [[HasPageName::{{PAGENAME}}| ]]
